title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 26 May 2015 - XWiki

09:54 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:54 <cjd> Good morning folks  
09:55 <cjd> gdelhumeau: do you know the status of Mohamed's PR on suggest display ?  
09:55 <gdelhumeau> hi cjd  
09:55 <gdelhumeau> I was reviewing it last week  
09:55 <gdelhumeau> I know you need a release soon so I'm working on it today  
09:55 <cjd> Is there still anything blocking a pull ?  
09:56 <cjd> Ok, thanks for your effort  
10:00 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:01 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:18 <msmeria> has quit  
10:19 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
10:19 <martin-h> hi cjd , do I need to open an issue at XWiki JIRA about this session stealing issue on tomcat 8 !?  
10:25 <vmassol> martin-h: I don't recall one being open so I'd say yes  
10:26 <martin-h> vmassol, it can be linked to http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-4109  , if I open a new one it could have the same exact title ;)  
10:28 <vmassol> ah yes  
10:28 <vmassol> it already exists then  
10:28 <vmassol> :)  
10:28 <vmassol> but it's closed let me read it  
10:28 <vmassol> yes that one was solved  
10:28 <vmassol> so you need to create a new one  
10:28 <martin-h> vmassol, thanks  
10:28 <vmassol> you can mention tomcat 8 in the title  
10:33 <gsmeria> has quit  
10:37 <martin-h> here it is http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12125  
10:42 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
10:51 <vmassol> thanks martin-h  
10:56 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
11:00 <msmeria> has quit  
11:01 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
11:05 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
11:15 <DarkKnightCZ1> has quit  
11:25 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
13:03 <gdelhumeau> cjd: the suggest is released  
13:04 <gdelhumeau> with the documentation: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Multiselect+custom+display  
13:51 <cjd> wooo thank you very much gdelhumeau :)  
13:53 <Pbas> Hello Vincent I hope you feel better :-),  you asked me to test your fix about JNDI datasource bug: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-11706 ... it doesn't work with 7.0.1. I have same bug.  
13:55 <vmassol> Pbas: hmm strange, it fixed it for me  
13:57 <vmassol> Pbas: I guess you should create a new issue then  
13:59 <Pbas> Ok thxs  
14:07 <Pbas> Here: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12127 Thxs :-)  
14:31 <gsmeria> has quit  
14:39 <woshilapin> has quit  
15:10 <msmeria> has quit  
15:31 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
15:47 <Pbas> Vincent my JNDI datasource working well now :-)  
15:52 <Enygma`> has quit  
15:53 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
15:54 <vmassol> Pbas: ah cool, so the issue should be closed as "cannot reproduce"?  
15:54 <Pbas> yes thxs  
15:54 <vmassol> url?  
15:55 <Pbas> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12127  
15:55 <Pbas> By the way jiira doesn't send mail anymore...  
15:56 <vmassol> hmm indeed, checking with infra  
16:48 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
16:50 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
17:00 <Enygma`> has quit  
17:00 <evalica> has quit  
17:07 <silverdrop> has quit  
17:07 <vmassol> has quit  
17:09 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
17:20 <vmassol> has quit  
17:23 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
17:31 <vmassol> Pbas: jira emails should be fine now, thanks for noticing and reporting!  
17:39 <gdelhumeau> cjd: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Multiselect+custom+display version 1.4 released  
17:40 <cjd> awesome  
17:40 <cjd> How is progress on Totem ?  
17:40 <gdelhumeau> gonna release a version of the current state  
17:40 <cjd> ok sounds good  
17:40 <gdelhumeau> you need it too?  
17:41 <cjd> It's not a dire necessity but we need it to make progress as an application so yes and no :)  
17:42 <cjd> What we don't want is for the changes to stagnate and then we're not aware of newly introduced bugs and perhaps development begins to branch from the currently released version  
17:43 <gdelhumeau>  [WARNING] Rule 0: org.apache.maven.plugins.enforcer.RequireJavaVersion failed with message:  
17:43 <gdelhumeau>     You must release with Java 6!  
17:43 <gdelhumeau> what the f\*\*  
17:44 <cjd> maybe it's basing on an old version of xwiki, that's certainly wrong IMO  
17:44 <tmortagne> yes usually means you are using a pre 6.x commons-pom  
17:46 <tmortagne> this is to ensure jars you build will actually work in a a version of XWiki are is supposed to support Java 6  
17:46 <tmortagne> s/are/that/  
17:46 <gdelhumeau> I upgrade to 6.2.2  
17:46 <gdelhumeau> since I have a dependency that is based on 6.2.2  
17:46 <gdelhumeau> the app cannot work on 4.x (needs webjar)  
17:46 <gdelhumeau> and so I don't need to install java 6 :)  
17:48 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: are you sure  <developers> is up to date  
17:48 <tmortagne> ?  
17:49 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
17:49 <gdelhumeau> why?  
17:50 <cjd> <developers> <developers> <developers> <developers>  
17:53 <ClemensR> has left #xwiki  
17:53 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: Mohamed is starting to have a few contribution and he is not listed, that's why I'm mentionning it

19:44 <debajit> When I edit a page in XWiki and hit "Save and View", how does it get redirected to the page contents — I am trying to find the understand the code for this (sorry, I am new to Struts). Could anyone point me in the right direction where I could find this code?
